iati-activity.reporting-org: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
iati-activity.title: West Africa, secondments : support to Ebola response with external expertise
iati-activity.description: The current Ebola outbreak across Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone has surpassed all other Ebola outbreaks in terms of cases, deaths and geographic spread. The Multilateral organizations and the Governments’ bodies have beefed up their responses in their respective fields, thus human and financial resources needs have increased, and Switzerland who has contributed up to CHF 29 Mio to the response in 2014 wishes to pursue its commitment by assigning specialised personnel where and when needed.
iati-activity.participating-org: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
